name: Loaded Dice (H_Labs)
description:
Shoot dice in this game of Russian roulette. Each roll has a different effect that you can use to tilt the odds in your favor. Draw a blank and you'll be eliminated. Be the last one standing!

Controls: Just the mouse. Click the die tower on the table to roll. Click another player or your name tag to select the target of the roll.

Possible Rolls:

RollDescription1Everyone loses a die.2Adds 1 to all your rolls. The value of your roll cannot exceed the die.3Subtracts 1 from all your rolls. Your roll cannot be less than 1.4Adds two 4-sided dice to your gun. If your gun does not have room, the extra die will be discarded.5Replace a die with a die of your choice. A 4-sided die is added if the gun is empty.6Add a die of your choice to an empty chamber. If the gun is already full, the die will be discarded.7Next turn the target cannot roll a blank, but you cannot use any "rigs" either.8Your die results are reversed. If you roll a 1, you instead get a 20; if you roll a 4, you get a 16; and so on.9Skip the next turn.10Swap chambers with another player. You cannot target yourself.11Next turn the target will roll the same number as the last player to roll.12Select the next person to take a turn.13You can only roll the maximum and minimum value for a die.14One die will be randomly selected. All other dice will becomes copies of that die.15On the target's next turn, there will be no value on the rolled die and they cannot gain a rig. They can still draw a blank and be eliminated.16Replace all future rolls for a number with another number.17Adds a four-sided die to a gun. This die is special and has a 7 instead of a 1.18The target can only roll even numbers.19You can only roll odd numbers.20Reloads all die in the target's gun.

Originally intended for the 2022 GMTK game jam with the theme "Roll of the Dice", but things had to be pushed past the deadline
